```{r}
param_est_fun <- function(parms){
  print(parms)
  year = 2013
  start = start_all[year(start_all)==year]
  stop = stop_all[year(stop_all)==year]
  results_2013 <- runForecasts(start, stop, n_days, run_space, obs, delay = 5, model_name = model_name, gif = gif,avg_o2 = avg_o2,avg_temp=avg_temp,uncert = uncert, archiveForecasts = archiveForecasts, parms=parms)
  #write.csv(results_year,paste("../DO_modeling_results/",date,"/forecast_2013_",model_name,"_model_",uncert,"_uncert.csv", sep = ""))
  rmse_2013 <- calcRmseTotal(n_days, results_2013, cali = 14/run_space) # Calculate rmse for all days
  
  year = 2014
  start = start_all[year(start_all)==year]
  stop = stop_all[year(stop_all)==year]
  results_2014 <- runForecasts(start, stop, n_days, run_space, obs, delay = 5, model_name = model_name, gif = gif,avg_o2 = avg_o2,avg_temp=avg_temp,uncert = uncert, archiveForecasts = archiveForecasts, parms=parms)
  #write.csv(results_year,paste("../DO_modeling_results/",date,"/forecast_2013_",model_name,"_model_",uncert,"_uncert.csv", sep = ""))
  rmse_2014 <- calcRmseTotal(n_days, results_2014, cali = 14/run_space) # Calculate rmse for all days
  
  year = 2015
  start = start_all[year(start_all)==year]
  stop = stop_all[year(stop_all)==year]
  results_2015 <- runForecasts(start, stop, n_days, run_space, obs, delay = 5, model_name = model_name, gif = gif,avg_o2 = avg_o2,avg_temp=avg_temp,uncert = uncert, archiveForecasts = archiveForecasts, parms=parms)
  #write.csv(results_year,paste("../DO_modeling_results/",date,"/forecast_2013_",model_name,"_model_",uncert,"_uncert.csv", sep = ""))
  rmse_2015 <- calcRmseTotal(n_days, results_2015, cali = 14/run_space) # Calculate rmse for all days
  
  year = 2016
  start = start_all[year(start_all)==year]
  stop = stop_all[year(stop_all)==year]
  results_2016 <- runForecasts(start, stop, n_days, run_space, obs, delay = 5, model_name = model_name, gif = gif,avg_o2 = avg_o2,avg_temp=avg_temp,uncert = uncert, archiveForecasts = archiveForecasts, parms=parms)
  #write.csv(results_year,paste("../DO_modeling_results/",date,"/forecast_2013_",model_name,"_model_",uncert,"_uncert.csv", sep = ""))
  rmse_2016 <- calcRmseTotal(n_days, results_2016, cali = 14/run_space) # Calculate rmse for all days
  
  rmses = c(rmse_2013, rmse_2014, rmse_2015, rmse_2016)
  rmse_final = mean(rmses, na.rm = T)
  print(rmse_final)
  return(rmse_final)
}
```
